admin_templates.template: <xen:selectunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}]" value="{xen:raw $preparedOption.option_value}" hint="{$preparedOption.hint}" multiple="{xen:if '{$multiple} == true', 'true'}" size="{xen:if '{$multiple} == true', '10'}"> <xen:options source="$formatParams" /> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

listener.description: Listens for navtabs to add Chat links

phrases.phrase: You can fill in several comma-separated usernames. Leave emptu in order to skip the username filter.

1. Terms and rules also apply to chat.
  2. Never give out your password or credit card number in an instant message conversation. To help prevent infection by a computer virus or worm, never accept or open any file or link in an instant message until you verify its authenticity with the sender.
  3. Chat content are saved in user database for later reference if necessary
Search within chat history according to the following criteria:
You were logged out of the chatroom.
These options will override those you enter in the config.php file in AJAX-Chat directory.
Allow/Disallow registered users to delete their own messages

Allow guest users to connect to AJAX-Chat. This option gives read-only access to unregistered users: write permissions are in a separate option below.
Note that disabling this option will result in all connected guests to be kicked out unceremoniously.
Allow/Disallow guest users to choose their own userName
This options gives unregistered users the permission to send message within chatrooms.
Allow/Disallow users to change their username (nickname)
Will be ignored if "Strictly limit channels" is checked.
Will be ignored if "Strictly limit channels" is checked.
Select the nodes you want to generate channels from. Leaving this setting blank will generate a "wrong channel name" error.
Name given to the AJAX-Chat bot

If selected, the AJAX-Chat will be closed to regular users & moderators.
Only admin will be able to connect.
Hostname for the database that will store AJAX-Chat data (logs, online users, etc.)
Password is not included into options backup.
Defines the default time in minutes a user gets banned if kicked by a moderator without ban minutes parameter
Leaving this setting blank will generate a "wrong channel name" error.
Totally disable access to the native AJAX-Chat user interface.
Guest users should be distinguished by either a prefix or a suffix or both (no whitespace)

Striclty limit discussion channels to those selected? If enabled, this means neither private channels nor private messages will be allowed. There exists another option for disabling private messages or private channels separately.
Max time difference in days for old messages before they are purged from the database
Defines if registered users (including moderators) have access to the logs (admins are always granted access). This concerns only native AJAX-Chat logs, not XF integrated logs.
Defines the max number of messages a user may send per minute
Does not affect admins nor moderators.
Assigns chat moderator permissions to selected group
Changed usernames should be distinguished by either a prefix or a suffix or both (no whitespace)
Private channels should be distinguished by either a prefix or a suffix or both (no whitespace)
WARNING This option is ineffective while some issues are being investigated. Defines if messages which have been sent before the user entered the channel are shown
Defines if old messages are purged from the database
Max time difference in hours for messages fetched on each DB request. Messages older will not be fetched. This does not affect logs.
Max number of messages to fetch on each database request.
Show/Hide info messages such as "UserA logged into chat".
Can access AJAX-Chat as guest user
Can access AJAX-Chat as full user

<xen:title>{xen:phrase modm_ajaxchat_tabname} - {xen:phrase modm_ajaxchat_report_chat_message}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase modm_ajaxchat_report_chat_message}</xen:h1>
<form action="{xen:link 'chat/report', $chatMessage}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase report_reason}:</label></dt> <dd><textarea name="message" id="ctrl_message" rows="2" class="textCtrl Elastic"></textarea></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase modm_ajaxchat_report_message}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
